entry.summary:
吴说获悉，MetaMask 宣布在最新版本的扩展中，只要启用自动 NFT 检测，所有 ERC-721 和 1155 代币都会出现。通过此更新，您可以发送 ERC-721 代币，将很快添加发送 ERC-1155 代币的功能。https://twitter.com/MetaMask/status/1643283434771456000
MetaMask 🦊💙: In our latest version of extension, all ERC-721 and 1155 tokens should appear as long as automatic NFT detection is enabled. With this update, you can send ERC-721 tokens. We’ll add the ability to send ERC-1155 tokens soon.

entry.summary: 吴说获悉，据美国司法部，该组织扣押了 6 个虚拟货币账户，没收了价值约 1.12 亿美元的与加密货币投资诈骗有关的虚拟货币。欺诈者通过与线上认识的受害者建立长期关系，诱使他们投资于欺诈性加密货币交易平台，然后资金被转入欺诈者控制的加密货币地址和账户。

entry.summary: 澳大利亚储备银行在周二的政策会议上将官方现金利率维持在 3.60%，结束了自去年 5 月以来基准利率连续 10 次上调。澳大利亚的通胀率最近才开始下降，从 1 月份的 7.4% 降至 2 月份的 6.8%。（华尔街日报）https://www.wsj.com/articles/reserve-bank-of-australia-holds-interest-rates-steady-as-inflation-softens-8e7818a7

entry.title: The ISM manufacturing index weak print today is welcome but not exactly surprising given ongoing goods deflation. The main issue with inflation is wit...
entry.summary:
The ISM manufacturing index weak print today is welcome but not exactly surprising given ongoing goods deflation. The main issue with inflation is with services (80% of GDP) and unfortunately the labor market is still quite tight.

entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m. https://twitter.com/balajis/status/1636797265317867520
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
